data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Janák, Jiří (2019): Revision of the South African genus Neopimus (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae). Zootaxa 4577 (2): 361-370, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.2.8|9 occurrences
